1.1.name: wordpress/members-import
1.1.description:
This allows you to batch import of users/members taken from an uploaded CSV file.

It will add users/members with basic information, including firstname, lastname, username, password and email address. Each user who is added will be a 'subscriber' if value not provided in csv file, and be able to login to your site.

You can also choose to send a notification to the new users and to display password nag on user login.

There are no additional options available at the moment, but if you want to add a bunch of users in one go, this will do this for you quickly.

Basic Fields:
user_login
user_pass
user_email
user_url
user_nicename
display_name
user_registered
first_name
last_name
nickname
description
rich_editing
comment_shortcuts
admin_color
use_ssl
show_admin_bar_front
show_admin_bar_admin
role
